name: Lunar Leap
description:
You're a moon dweller minding your own business when, suddenly, strange spacecrafts start invading! Not only that, they shoot colorful hurty orbs at you!

Luckily, the crafts seem to disintegrate when you bump into them...

Unluckily, there seem to be an infinite number of invading spacecrafts...

Controls
  • Move
    • W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys
  • Jump
    • SPACE or Left Click
  • Pause/Unpause
    • ESC or TAB
  • Restart on Death
    • ESC, SHIFT, or Right Click
  • Quit (when game is paused, or on death screen)
    • Q
Resource Credits

Music - Boom Box at the Temple by Antti Luode

Font - Mofuji by Fub
